hotel_name: Hotel Indigo Berlin β€“ Kuβ€™damm
title: Air conditioning and phone not workingβ€
content:
Our AC and phone in the room were not working. We asked the front desk about it, who in turn sent up a staff to check. He confirmed that the whole 4th floor had no AC working, and just advised us to open the windows. We were fine with that.
However,  the next day upon check out, we were asked how was our stay was and I replied it was ok except for the aircon that wasnβ€™t working. The front desk staff replied that it was working this morning. We told  her that last night the staff advised us to open the window because the AC was not  working for the entire floor. The front desk staff still insisted it was working. It sounded that we were making all this this up!  We wouldβ€™ve appreciated it if the front desk were more apologetic. A simple sorry would have enough.

hotel_name: Hotel Indigo Berlin β€“ Kuβ€™damm
title: Hotel Indigo Berlin Ku'damm was an amazing experience with many pros and no cons at all. β€
content: It is very close to the famous Berlin Zoologisher Garten station, where anything is easily accessible from. Very hospitable staff and a cosy atmosphere. Definitely a great place to stay in Berlin.

hotel_name: Hotel Indigo Berlin β€“ Kuβ€™damm
title: μµκ³ β€
content: Nice, stylish and cozy. Everything is ready: wifi, iron, safebox, fridge, TV,  air-conditioner, elevator,  etc. Close to major transportation, walking distance.

hotel_name: Hotel Indigo Berlin β€“ Kuβ€™damm
title: Good choice, very centralβ€
content:
My family and I had a very pleasant stay at Indigo. The location is superb, very close to the Zoo station that connects west Berlin to all other areas -including both airports- without changing lines. There is also direct connection with City Cube Congress Center, which was very convenient for me.

title: Air conditioning and phone not workingβ€
content:
Our AC and phone in the room were not working. We asked the front desk about it, who in turn sent up a staff to check. He confirmed that the whole 4th floor had no AC working, and just advised us to open the windows. We were fine with that.
However,  the next day upon check out, we were asked how was our stay was and I replied it was ok except for the aircon that wasnβ€™t working. The front desk staff replied that it was working this morning. We told  her that last night the staff advised us to open the window because the AC was not  working for the entire floor. The front desk staff still insisted it was working. It sounded that we were making all this this up!  We wouldβ€™ve appreciated it if the front desk were more apologetic. A simple sorry would have enough.

hotel_name: Flemings Hotel Frankfurt-Central former Flemings Express Frankfurt
title: Nice location!β€
content:
Nice location and 24hrs mini market in hotel. Good quality breakfast. Checkout at 12:00am!! (Normally 11:00am at other hotels) 
Self checkin is slightly annoying but staffs stand-by for assistance.
Just drop room key onto box for checkout! 
2mins by walk to railway station.

hotel_name: NH ν•¨λ¶€λ¥΄ν¬ νΈλ¥΄λ„ λ λ° (NH Hamburg Horner Rennbahn)
title: Clean hotel with good sized roomsβ€
content:
The hotel is located in a quiet residential area. It is about a 15 minutes walk to the nearest U-Bahn (Horner Rennbahn) which is where a bakery, a convenience store, a supermarket, a deli, a drugstore and other shops are located.  Alternatively, you can take bus 23 in either direction to the U-Bahn, which is either 1 stop (to Horner Rennbahn) or 3 stops away (to Wandsbek Markt). There is a police post at Horner Rennbahn.  It feels quite safe to walk back to the hotel at night from Horner Rennbahn, though the streets are quite dark and it would always be wise to exercise caution. 

There is a friendly small convenience store just across the hotel which opens till about 10 pm. 

The hotel has free wifi but you would have to get new login details from the reception every 24 hours. The wifi is weak so do expect delays. 

The fitness centre isn't much of a fitness centre at all which houses a steps machine and a treadmill. There were no free weights or weights machine to my dismay. There is however a sauna and a resting room. 

The room was clean and cosy and has a bathtub. Toiletries were unfortunately not complete, with only a shampoo and body wash. The hotel does not provide toothbrush and toothpaste, has no razor, shaving gel, shower caps and no comb. 

The towels were of good quality, soft and very clean. 

Service from the hotel staff was generally helpful, polite and friendly. 

Overall I had a very pleasant stay with Hamburg Horn and I will choose to stay with Hamburg Horn again on my next trip to Hamburg.

hotel_name: ibis Styles Hamburg Alster City
title: Nice hotel, 2 star facilitiesβ€
content:
You can go to all tourist attractions by subway ( U Bahn), the U Bahn station is very convenient reachable.
Don't get wrong expectation by the word Alster City,
Everything else is good and nice. Staff is very friendly and helpful.
Breakfast is wonderful.

hotel_name: ibis Styles Hamburg Alster City
title: Great place to stay in Hamburgβ€
content: This is the first time we have ever stayed at an Ibis Styles Hotel and will definitely be looking out for them in other locations. Lovely clean rooms with big comfy beds, an amazing breakfast and very helpful attentive staff.  The hotel is in the suburbs but, if you have a Hamburg Card, it takes only about10 minutes to reach the centre of the city using the U-Bahn and the nearest station is just a short walk away on Hamburger Strasse..  We have previously stayed in the centre of Hamburg at not particularly good hotels which cost a lot more than this one so we will just book this one again when we return in the future.

hotel_name: ibis Styles Hamburg Alster City
title: Rechnung nicht bekommen, teuere Preise als anderen fΓΌr die selbe Nachtβ€
content: ich habe ΓΌber Agoda gebucht und das Hotel hat mir die Rechnung mit der Abzug von Kommission erstellt. Sie sagten, dass man Agoda fΓΌr die Rechnung kontaktieren soll. Agoda erstellt auch keine Rechnung, weil Sie im Ausland sitzen. Hotel und Agoda haben Partnerschaft und der Kunden mΓΌssen das klΓ¤ren???? Ausserdem habe ich etwa 40 β‚¬ teuerer fΓΌr die Nacht gezahlt, als die anderen Gasten.

hotel_name: ibis Styles Hamburg Alster City
title: Zum 3. Mal da. β€
content: Wir waren diesmal das 3. Mal da und waren doch etwas enttΓ¤uscht. Bisher immer super nur diesmal war das Zimmer nicht so toll. Die LautstΓ¤rke morgens im Hof mit Geschirr geklapper und auf der Etage mit TΓΌren knallen, war doch sehr stΓ¶rend. An den bunten MΓ¶beln  ( schΓ¶ne Idee) blΓ¤tterte an vielen Stellen schon die Farbe ab, sollte mal ΓΌberarbeitet werden. Vor dem Bad ein riesiger Fleck im Teppich und die Dusche mΓΌsste auch mal vernΓΌnftig gereinigt werden und die schwarzen Ecken beseitigt werden.  Das Personal ist super freundlich und zuvorkommend. Wir waren eigentlich zufrieden und wΓΌrden gerne wieder kommen.

hotel_name: ibis Styles Hamburg Alster City
title: Rundum zufrieden β€
content: Kostenloses parken in der nahen Umgebung, nettes Personal und ein im Preis inbegriffenes FrΓΌhstΓΌck waren von Vorteil. AuΓerdem war alles sauber, etwas muffiger Geruch im Bad aus der Dusche, U-Bahn Station und Einkaufszentrum in der NΓ¤he (5 min). FΓΌr den Rest muss man schon 20 min mit der U-Bahn fahren. Die Betten waren eher hart. Ich habe sehr gute geschlafen, meine Freundin fands eher nicht so gut.

hotel_name: ibis Styles Hamburg Alster City
title: Rent och frΓ¤scht β€
content: Mycket rent och frΓ¤scht. Sparsam men god frukost. Man kan resa pΓ¥ den gula linjen och smidigt ta sig runt i hela staden

hotel_name: ibis Styles Hamburg Alster City
title: Great place to stay in Hamburgβ€
content: This is the first time we have ever stayed at an Ibis Styles Hotel and will definitely be looking out for them in other locations. Lovely clean rooms with big comfy beds, an amazing breakfast and very helpful attentive staff.  The hotel is in the suburbs but, if you have a Hamburg Card, it takes only about10 minutes to reach the centre of the city using the U-Bahn and the nearest station is just a short walk away on Hamburger Strasse..  We have previously stayed in the centre of Hamburg at not particularly good hotels which cost a lot more than this one so we will just book this one again when we return in the future.
